regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re, requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,): first_ip = re.findall("x_first_ip.+?'(.*?)'", page_data)[0] first_c = re.findall("x_first_c.+?'(.*?)'", page_data)[0] ket2 = re.findall("ket2.+?'(.*?)'", page_data)[0] first_ua = re.findall("x_first_ua.+?'(.*?)'", page_data)[0] preurl = 'http://tmg.ustreamix.com/' # here is the server url which changed most of time url = preurl + 'stats.php?p=' + first_ip + '&C=' + first_c + '&Ket=' + ket2 source = requests.get(url, headers = {'Referer': 'http://v2.ustreamix.com/stream.php?id=fishing-tv', 'User-Agent': first_ua, 'Accept': '*/*'}).text tok = re.findall('var jdtk="(.*?)"', source)[0] return preurl + 'tmg.m3u8?stream=fishing-tv&token=' + tok
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:44.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/44.0 Iceweasel/44.0
